Message: The user completes the submission of the form

It looks like you're asking about ad credits for Voluum. If you need information on how to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit, you can check out this article: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). If you have any specific questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
how do I get the voluum ad credit coe?

To help you with the Voluum ad credit code, could you please clarify if you're looking for a promotional code to use on NewsBreak or if you need assistance with something specific related to Voluum? Let me know so I can provide the right information!

If you have received a promotional ad credit for NewsBreak, you can redeem it by following these steps:
1. Access the Billing Section in your NewsBreak account.
2. Under Ad Credits, click on ‘Add ad credits.'
3. Choose ‘Customize’ and enter the total value of your gifted ad credit, plus at least $1. For example, if your gifted ad credit is $200, your total should be a minimum of $201 or more, depending on the additional ad credit you would like to purchase.
4. Enter the promotional code.
5. Provide your credit card information and check out.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

If you haven't received your promotional code yet, I recommend reaching out to NewsBreak support for assistance. You can email them at adsupport@newsbreak.com with details about your issue, and they will be able to help you with obtaining your promotional code. Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with!
